content: Ok, the repository has been created, however, he won't be able to use it to push files if it isn't authenticated, so we need to do that, or, I can provide that info and rest of secrets to him in prompt as this is safe with him this way. We also need to create a /cache/ folder for him in his /home/computeruse/ because this is where he likes it. Then I run the setup.sh in palios-taey-nova/scripts/ right?
